title: Fernet and Coke Recipe
full_text:
Fernet and Coke Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
cup
Coca-Cola
1/2
cup
Fernet Branca
Garnish:
lemon
wedge or
twist
Directions
Fill a tall Collins glass with ice. Add Coca Cola and Fernet Branca. Stir gently, garnish with lemon wedge or twist.
Liqueurs & Fortified Wines
Summer Drinks
